ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This study is funded by CAMS Innovation Fund for Medical Sciences (2016-I2M-1-014 and 2016-I2M-1-019), National Natural Sciences Foundations of China (31700153), Fundamental Research Funds for the Central Universities and PUMC Youth Fund (2017310039), Yunnan Applied Basic Research Projects (2018FB026), Yunnan provincial innovation team (2016HC009) and 2017 Yunnan Medical Reserve Talents (H-2017034). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.

sec.title: Authors' contributions
sec.p: Conceived and designed the experiments: L.D.L., Q.H.L., and SZD. Performed the experiments: J.S., Y.J.H., H.Z.L., and X.H. Analyzed the data: H.W.Z. and Y.G.H. Contributed reagents, materials, analysis tools: J.J.W., X.J., J.Q.L., Z.N.Y., H.T.F., L.G. Animal experiment: H.J.S., Z.L.H., F.M.Y., and X.W. Wrote the paper: J.S. and Y.J.H. Edited the manuscript: L.D.L., Q.H.L., and S.Z.D.
